subject: Shifter
description_text:
Hi there, I purchased the 7+R shifter and I was hoping you could tell me the thread pitch on the shaft so I could upgrade the shifter? 

Thanks!
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Richard Turner,  Please send us a photo of the product for confirmation. We offer two different shifter models—are you looking to replace just the gear knob? The standard thread size for our gear knobs is M8.

Yes, just wanting to put something with a bigger diameter! Thanks 
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Richard Turner,  Alright, they are M8 size.
